pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, August 21, 2016:

Sudbury, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet retreat.

Laurentian University
935 Ramsey Lake Road
Sudbury, Ontario

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Cabinet retreat family photo.

Science North
100 Ramsey Lake Road
Sudbury, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
